name: It adapts to your breathing - Short horror duel for the game CURSED
name_original: It adapts to your breathing - Short horror duel for the game CURSED
description:
It adapts to your breathing, and that's just the beginning.

It adapts to your breathing is a very short horror adventure in pamphlet format, adapted for the CURSED role-playing game and other horrific OSR products. CURSED is a creation of Kobayashi, you can find the book at the following link: https://www.lulu.com/fr/spotlight/livresdelours/

The scenario works in duel format, i.e. one referee and one player. It can easily introduce a player to the horror genre without investing a lot of time.
